name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a proven track record of delivering high-performance solutions, particularly in AI-driven applications. My technical expertise includes **Node.js**, **Vue.js**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and hands-on experience with modern web technologies like **HTML**, **CSS**, **PostCSS**, **SASS**, **Git**, **Webpack**, and **npm**. I excel in building enterprise-grade platforms leveraging microservices architecture and event-driven systems to support scalability and responsiveness.

I have substantial experience in Test-Driven Development (TDD) employing frameworks such as **Mocha** and **Jest** to ensure code quality. Additionally, I’m proficient in PHP and **Symfony**, further augmenting my versatility in full stack development. My background includes integrating predictive analytics and intelligent automation, while leading projects that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

I am passionate about delivering secure applications and possess deep cloud proficiency on **Azure** and **AWS**. I actively employ CI/CD automation techniques, coupled with a strong foundation in developing and deploying machine learning models, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
